siteMetadata.title: Trafikito - monitor output of any command
siteMetadata.author: Lukas Liesis

markdownRemark.excerpt: In the notifications list, notifications that are turned off have a red background. Turn notification on and it will lose the red color.
markdownRemark.html: In the notifications list, notifications that are turned off have a red background. Turn notification on and it will lose the red color.
